name: Grand California Federation
startIntroPart2: You, President Bret Thomas, are the leader of the GCF, the Grand California Federation, whose lands encompass California, Oregon, and Washington.  After winning independence from America, you must now lead your nation to prosperity!
declaringWar: You have crossed California one too many times. Now, prepare to be destroyed like the you have. never seen before
attacked: Your army fighting my army is like bringing a knife to a gunfight. After we win the war, you will be exiled, and forced to live away from any civilization, as an outcast.
defeated: We may have fallen, but the Federation will still crush you.
introduction: Hello. You have three options. Stand with us, stand against us, or get the hell out of our way. Your choice.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
